markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 175 2.0 **Prerequisites** [thief racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=3); [Debilitating Strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=10) --- You attack with great precision. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.
  • **Debilitation** The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from your attacks.
  • **Debilitation** The target becomes off-guard.
name: Precise Debilitations

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Precise Debilitations Source Player Core pg. 175 2.0 Prerequisites thief racket; Debilitating Strike --- You attack with great precision. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike. Debilitation The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from your attacks. Debilitation The target becomes off-guard.
